briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety Study to Evaluate Gadavist (Gadobutrol) as Contrast Agent in Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) of Vascular Diseases in Chinese Patients
officialTitle: A Single-blind, Intra-individual, Crossover, Multicenter Study of the Efficacy, Safety and Tolerability of Gadavist (1.0 M) in Comparison With Magnevist (0.5 M) as Contrast Agent in the Enhanced Magnetic Resonance Angiography (MRA) in Chinese Patients
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if the contrast agent is effective and safe in the Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) of vascular diseases in patients of Chinese origin.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Vessel Segments Visualized With Diagnostic Quality
